## Command class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The Abstract Command class to be extended by scoped Command classes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class Command<O extends Options, P extends Params> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(options)](./common.command._constructor_.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Construct a new Command. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [CONSTANTS](./common.command.constants.md) | <p><code>readonly</code></p><p><code>static</code></p> | typeof CONSTANTS | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Constants associated with this Command. |
|  [options](./common.command.options.md) |  | O | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Options to use when parsing the provided CLI command |
|  [params](./common.command.params.md) |  | [Params](./common.commandparams.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Params generated in reflection of the provided options and the CLI command. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clean()](./common.command.clean.md) | <code>protected</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Clean the params mounted to this Command. |
|  [collect()](./common.command.collect.md) | <code>protected</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Collect all CLI arguments as parameters. |
|  [prepare(results)](./common.command.prepare.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Prepare the processed results for emiting as a string. |
|  [process()](./common.command.process.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Process the Command params into a new object for transport. |
